other_title: 聖闘士星矢 セインティア翔
opening_theme: "The Beautiful Brave" by Shouko (Aina Suzuki), Kyouko (Mao Ichimichi (M.A.O)), Saori Kido (Inori Minase), Mii (Megumi Nakajima)
ending_theme: #1: "Hohoemi no Resonance (微笑みのレゾナンス)" by Shouko (Aina Suzuki), Kyouko (Mao Ichimichi (M.A.O)) (eps 1-6, 8-10)
#2: "Arasoi Shiniyukumono-tachi ni Shukufuku wo (争い死にゆく者たちに祝福を)" by Eris (Mao Ichimichi (M.A.O)) (ep 7)
